meanings.definition: Crenelations: a series of indentations or gaps in a wall or structure, typically used for defense or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The ancient castle had crenelations along the top of its walls.
meanings.sent2: The architect included crenelations in the design to give the building a medieval look.
meanings.sent3: The crenelations on the fortress walls made it look like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The crenelations on the tower created a dramatic silhouette against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the crenelations on the castle walls because they looked like little teeth.

meanings.definition: Crenelations: the act of adding crenelations to a structure.
meanings.sent1: The crenelations of the castle were carefully crafted by skilled masons.
meanings.sent2: He took pride in his work, especially when it came to the crenelations he added to the tower.
meanings.sent3: The crenelations were so perfectly placed that they seemed to dance along the edge of the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch turned the plain wall into a masterpiece with the addition of crenelations.
meanings.sent5: The crenelations transformed the building into a fortress straight out of a fairy tale.
